verses.verse: This<WG5124> is the third<WG5154> time I am coming<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG5209>. In<WG1909> the mouth<WG4750> of two<WG1417> or<WG2532> three<WG5140> witnesses<WG3144> shall<WG2476> every<WG3956> word<WG4487> be established<WG2476>.

I told you before<WG4280>, and<WG2532> foretell you<WG4302>, as if<WG5613> I were present<WG3918>, the second<WG1208> time; and<WG2532> being absent<WG548> now<WG3568> I write<WG1125> to them which heretofore have sinned<WG4258>, and<WG2532> to all<WG3956> other<WG3062>, that<WG3754>, if<WG1437> I come<WG2064> again<WG1519> <WG3825>, I will<WG5339> not<WG3756> spare<WG5339>:

Since<WG1893> ye seek<WG2212> a proof<WG1382> of Christ<WG5547> speaking<WG2980> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>, which<WG3739> to<WG1519> you-ward<WG5209> is<WG770> not<WG3756> weak<WG770>, but<WG235> is mighty<WG1414> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>.

For<WG1063> <WG2532> though<WG1487> he was crucified<WG4717> through<WG1537> weakness<WG769>, yet<WG235> he liveth<WG2198> by<WG1537> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316>. For<WG1063> we<WG2249> also<WG2532> are weak<WG770> in<WG1722> him<WG846>, but<WG235> we shall live<WG2198> with<WG4862> him<WG846> by<WG1537> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316> toward<WG1519> you<WG5209>. in him: or, with him

Examine<WG3985> yourselves<WG1438>, whether<WG1487> ye be<WG2075> in<WG1722> the faith<WG4102>; prove<WG1381> your own selves<WG1438>.<WG2228> Know ye<WG1921> not<WG3756> your own selves<WG1438>, how that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, except<WG1509> ye be<WG2075> reprobates<WG5100> <WG96>?
But<WG1161> I trust<WG1679> that<WG3754> ye shall know<WG1097> that<WG3754> we<WG2249> are<WG2070> not<WG3756> reprobates<WG96>.

Now<WG1161> I pray<WG2172> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> that ye<WG5209> do<WG3361> <WG4160> no<WG3367> evil<WG2556>; not<WG3756> that<WG2443> we<WG2249> should appear<WG5316> approved<WG1384>, but<WG235> that<WG2443> ye<WG5210> should do<WG4160> that which is honest<WG2570>, though<WG1161> we<WG2249> be<WG5600> as<WG5613> reprobates<WG96>.
For<WG1063> we can do<WG1410> nothing<WG3756> <WG5100> against<WG2596> the truth<WG225>, but<WG235> for<WG5228> the truth<WG225>.

For<WG1063> we<WG2249> are glad<WG5463>, when<WG3752> we are weak<WG770>, and<WG1161> ye<WG5210> are<WG5600> strong<WG1415>: and<WG1161> this<WG5124> also<WG2532> we wish<WG2172>, even your<WG5216> perfection<WG2676>. perfection: or, reformation, or, restoration

Therefore<WG5124> <WG1223> I write<WG1125> these things<WG5023> being absent<WG548>, lest<WG3363> being present<WG3918> I should use<WG5530> sharpness<WG664>, according<WG2596> to the power<WG1849> which<WG3739> the Lord<WG2962> hath given<WG1325> me<WG3427> to<WG1519> edification<WG3619>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> to<WG1519> destruction<WG2506>.

Finally<WG3063>, brethren<WG80>, farewell<WG5463>. Be perfect<WG2675>, be of good comfort<WG3870>, be of one<WG846> mind<WG5426>, live in peace<WG1514>; and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of love<WG26> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> shall be<WG2071> with<WG3326> you<WG5216>.
Greet<WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> an holy<WG40> kiss<WG5370>.

The grace<WG5485> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> the love<WG26> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> the communion<WG2842> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151>, be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all<WG3956>. Amen<WG281>. The second<WG1208> epistle to<WG4314> the Corinthians<WG2881> was written<WG1125> from<WG575> Philippi<WG5375>, a city of Macedonia<WG3109>, by<WG1223> Titus<WG5103> and<WG2532> Lucas<WG3065>.
